title: Why Olivia Rodrigo’s Choruses *Feel* Like Roblox Obby Wins
objectives: Map song structures as ‘level designs’ (verse = easy level, chorus = boss fight)
Auto-generate lyrics using Python + your text messages (real code included)
Test if sad songs *actually* get more streams (analyze Billboard data)

methodology.case_study: How K-pop producers use math to make addicting hooks
methodology.interactive: Build a ‘mood mixer’—sliders for BPM, key, lyrics = instant ‘hit’

validation.benchmark: Create a song snippet classmates can’t stop humming
